public class ServiceDetailsActivity extends androidx.appcompat.app.AppCompatActivity
Displays full details of a service or request. Allows the owner to update or remove requests, lets providers accept or update services.

    • getColorFromAttr

      private android.content.res.ColorStateList getColorFromAttr(int attr)
      /** Returns a color from the current theme using its attribute ID.

      This is used to apply theme-aware colors (like colorPrimary) to UI elements at runtime, especially for buttons that need to reflect light/dark mode or custom themes dynamically.

      Parameters:
      attr - The attribute ID.
      Returns:
      The corresponding color state list.
